rag.question: What is RAG technology?
rag.answer: Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) is an AI framework that combines information retrieval with text generation. It allows our chatbot to search through your documents for relevant information and then generate accurate, contextual responses based on that information.

formats.question: What file formats are supported?
formats.answer: Our platform supports a wide range of file formats including PDF, DOCX, XLSX, CSV, TXT, HTML, and more. If you have a specific file format need, please contact our support team.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Absolutely. We take data security very seriously. All data is encrypted both in transit and at rest. We use enterprise-grade security measures, and your documents never leave your secure environment. We also offer role-based access controls to manage who can access your data.

customize.question: Can I customize the chatbot's responses?
customize.answer: Yes, you can customize the chatbot's behavior through our advanced settings. You can adjust the tone, style, and level of detail in responses. Enterprise customers can also work with our team for more extensive customizations.

accuracy.question: How accurate are the responses?
accuracy.answer: Our RAG technology ensures high accuracy by retrieving relevant information directly from your documents. The chatbot will always cite its sources, allowing you to verify the information. In cases where it's uncertain, it will acknowledge limitations rather than providing incorrect information.

integration.question: Can I integrate this with my existing systems?
integration.answer: Yes, we offer API access and various integration options for Enterprise and Professional plans. This allows you to embed the chatbot in your internal tools, websites, or applications. Our team can work with you to ensure smooth integration.
